citations.narrative:
Per the facility’s disposition records, 26 sugar gliders died over the past year. The records did not contain, however, the
date of those deaths. Without records which fully disclose the animal’s disposition, legal and medical information
traceback is not possible. Be consistent in maintaining records disclosing the required disposition information including
the date of disposal/death. To be corrected by January 7, 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)(v) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Per the facility’s disposition records, 26 sugar gliders died over the past year. The records did not contain, however, the 
date of those deaths. Without records which fully disclose the animal’s disposition, legal and medical information 
traceback is not possible. Be consistent in maintaining records disclosing the required disposition information including 
the date of disposal/death. To be corrected by January 7, 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
